Standard group 'zombie' killing game with far more unique and challenging 'zombies' to slay then normal. A pleasing game with a few classes to pick between and some fancy guns that can get a bonus with the right class but can be used by any. 

Pro:
-Classes to pick between that level and get fun bonuses
-Good choice of guns with few 'bad' guns
-Classes work well as a team if used 'right'

Con
-Game can get very hard very quick with poor teamwork (If you've played Dark Souls this might actually just be fun)
-The cost of some of the more powerful guns gets extreme without leveling the classes that get cost reduction bonuses.
-DLC for the game, like guns, is in the stores clogging the game system (Minor complaint but annoying when you've got 60 seconds to shop)

This might be the funnest zombie shooting experience I'ze ever played. Great game for a group of friends to play if you want some fast paced FPS action on a busy night with only an hour or two of time.  This game gets intense, be prepared to cover your friend's back from the various zed's attempting to eat you both while at the same time trying to watch your own back.  This is a great example of a simple truth in any team based game, or in fact for life in general. Stand together, or die alone.

Are you too much of a badass to play Left 4 Dead but too much of a pussy to play Silent Hill or Resident Evil 4? This game has you covered with it's creepy music and environment, that for some reason makes you forget how powerful you are...with your fancy guns and all. Best discribed as L4D on meth, Killing Floor can be harder than the offspring of Titanite and Adamantium. Calling your friends on a steam and getting absolutly raped by a Fleshpound is the most fun you'll have playing this game. All jokes aside it's one of the best multiplayer experiences on steam or in any game ever made.

Cheap and very enjoyable with a demented twist, I give Killing Floor B+/Blue. Go buy this game.

Killing Floor est un jeu de survival-horror dans lequel vous devez tenir une certaines quantité de vagues ennemies seul ou en co-op ou bien vous faire plaisir avec des missions d'objectifs.
C'est un jeu très bien optimisé qui accepte meme les plus vieilles bécanes et qui possède un très bon gameplay et une jolie patte graphique pour l'année à laquelle il est sorti.
Il faut également savoir que ce jeu est désormais sous steam workshop ce qui devrait en ravir plus d'un !
La seul chose que je peut lui reprocher et le prix excessif des dlc qui pour beaucoup ne valent pas grand chose ou qui change simplement un skin à un prix exorbitant !
it is fantastic game that is fun to play with friends, if you are wanting a challenge or just wanting to play a play a farly scary game.
Excelente juego cooperativo, lastima que tenga tantos DLC y te cuestan mas que el juego mismo.

this game is great hours of fun! multiple classess to choose and level up. the game is updated often with new maps and DLC such as weapons and characters! the game also has steam workshop. the game has summer, halloween and winter events where the Zed look different and they release new content this is a great game! 9.5/10
Killing Floor is an exceptional example of a team based shootem' in the head game. Teamwork is essential to completing a level. Make your friends buy this.

The best FPS zombie-survival co-op game hands down(until KF2!). Sorry L4D, actual strategy and enjoyably challenging gameplay makes this game genuinely intense and rewarding; and the replay value made it the best money I've ever spent on Steam. I believe I bought it for $10 on a flash sale, but this game is priceless.
Player-made custom maps extend playability by a lot, and most maps were whitelisted so Perk progress can be made on them. Perk-leveling is a slow process, but each level adds invaluable advantages, especially at 5 and 6.
As for multiplayer, the KF community is like most online mosh pits: an assortment of team-players... and guys who drop you for teenage "lulz", just like any other online community.
Solo-play isn't where the game shines, but it is viable in some situations; such as finishing a wave of zeds as the last man standing, and solo-play as a Berserker in particular can help split zeds up.

In short: Grab this game if you're a team-player mature enough to learn zed mechanics(KF-wiki); if not, there's always CoD, RUST, and DAYZ.

I'd dare to say, that this is the best Game I've got on my Steamaccount!

Great game to sink countless hours into. Has a lot of replayability and is somewhat diverse with the perk system, encouraging better cooperation to survive muliple waves and a tough boss.  I am a fan of the BGM as it is mostly Instrumental Heavy metal as well as some nicely twisted industrial type Holiday music. I find Killing zeds to be quite enjoyable and i find myself coming back to this game to max out my levels and unlock achievements. If you like a nice co-op shooter, or anything with gore and blood, it is a must have on anyones' Steam Library (or if you just like shooting stuff). 11/10

Fun FPS shooter with far more fun and difficulty than it intially lets on to. Dlc packs are optional but do add a fun little flare to the game. The game and its dlc are on sale frequently and I would recommend this game to almost any zombie or fps fan

Have played Killing Floor since it's early stages and can definitely vouch for this game in the following aspects
+ Excellent Co-Operative Gameplay / Teamwork Based
+ Excellent Server Customization
+ Excellent Mod Community
+ Very Balanced Gameplay on all Difficulties
+ Lots of Content

As Killing Floor has a modding community to help power it through the Gaming Industry the amount of available content is virtually unlimited.
The weapons, classes and  bonuses/perks that come with such are plentiful and provide endless hours of progression and gameplay.

Definitely recommend playing this game with a group of friends, and if you want to troll them... nothing beats weldin them in a room with the Patriarch, Flesh Pounds or a bunch of Clots.

+ Recommend
